entry.title: About Me
entry.content:
徐昕宇 Xinyu Xu

I’m a second-year master student in Department of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE), School of Electronic Information and Electrical Engineering (SEIEE), Shanghai Jiao Tong University (SJTU).

I do research in MVIG lab advised by Prof. Yong-Lu Li and Prof. Cewu Lu. I was a research intern in Tencent Robotics-X lab. My research interests include embodied AI, computer vision, and robotics.

🤪 🖐 💪 👻

News!

[Jul. 2024] HumanVLA is released on arXiv.
[Jul. 2024] DISCO is accepted by ECCV 2024.
[Jul. 2023] One paper is accepted by IJCV.
[Jul. 2023] One paper is accepted by ICCV 2023.
[Jun. 2022] I won Best Bachelor Thesis in SJTU.
[Mar. 2022] One paper is accepted by CVPR 2022.
[Oct. 2021] One paper is accepted by IEEE T’PAMI.
[Sept. 2021] Awarded National Scholarship! Thanks!

Education

  • Shanghai Jiao Tong University (2018.09 - 2022.06)
    Department of Computer Science and Engineering, SEIEE.
    Engineering Honor Program, Zhiyuan College.

    B.Eng. student major in Computer Science and Technology.

  • Shanghai Jiao Tong University (2022.09 - 2025.03 Expected)
    Department of Computer Science and Engineering, SEIEE.

    M.Eng. student major in Computer Science and Technology.

    Beyond Object Recognition: A New Benchmark towards Object
